definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: It does not involve just borrowing money and repaying the principal with interest.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅涉及到借款和付还本息。

sentences.english: The deposit amount is set by the depositor and the accrued interests are paid by installment.
sentences.chinese: 存款金额由储户自定，分期支取本息。

sentences.english: The bank would hold that mortgage and you would pay it off, with interest.
sentences.chinese: 银行持有抵押权，你必须归还贷款的本息。

sentences.english: With the consent of the lender, the borrowers may repay the principal and interest of the loans ahead of schedule.
sentences.chinese: 经贷款人同意，借款人可提前归还贷款本息。

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
